HomePage.title: AestheticPro. Powered by Tunisian's most talented designers
HomePage.Followed_Stores_Products_subtitle: Check out the latest products from your favorite stores!
HomePage.Discount_Deals_subtitle: Unveil the Magic of Our Exclusive Products at Special Prices!
HomePage.Customize_section_subtitle: Create and customize your own products!
HomePage.Services_section_subtitle: What our platform can offer you!

ServicesPage.buying_section_title_1: How we offer the best shopping experience
ServicesPage.buying_section_subtitle: Discover unique, high-quality designs from our talented creators, all in one place. Experience shopping like never before!
ServicesPage.why_shop_paragraph: At AestheticPro.tn, we bring you the finest designs, crafted by talented creators. Each piece is a unique expression of creativity that you won't find anywhere else.
ServicesPage.guarantee_buying_1: A vast collection of one-of-a-kind designs to match your style.
ServicesPage.guarantee_buying_2: High-quality products with premium printing and materials.
ServicesPage.guarantee_buying_3: Fast, reliable shipping with transparent tracking.
ServicesPage.guarantee_buying_4: Hassle-free returns and exchanges for a smooth shopping experience.
ServicesPage.guarantee_buying_5: Supporting local and emerging designers from Tunisia.
ServicesPage.explore_latest_collections: Ready to explore the latest collections?
ServicesPage.selling_section_subtitle: Become a seller, Sell your designs on our platform and gain profits!
ServicesPage.why_sell_paragraph: AestheticPro.tn is the first platform in Tunisia offering opportunities to earn income through your creativity. Sell your designs, express your artistic vision, and watch your work come to life!
ServicesPage.guarantee_selling_1: Earning passive income by selling your designs.
ServicesPage.guarantee_selling_2: Reaching a wide audience and grow your personal brand.
ServicesPage.guarantee_selling_3: We handle production, shipping, and customer service for you.
ServicesPage.guarantee_selling_4: Joining a community of talented designers and creators.
ServicesPage.guarantee_selling_5: Free marketing support to promote your products across our platform and social media.
ServicesPage.guarantee_selling_6: Regular insights and tips to help you maximize your sales potential.
ServicesPage.selling_policy_question: Wanna know about our Selling Policy?
ServicesPage.affiliate_section_subtitle: Earn money by promoting our products! Share with your audience and earn commissions for each sale made through your referral.
ServicesPage.why_affiliate_paragraph: AestheticPro.tn offers an exciting opportunity for non-designers to earn income by promoting our unique products. Simply share your special affiliate link and earn a commission for every successful referral.
ServicesPage.guarantee_affiliate_1: Generous commission on every sale made through your referral.
ServicesPage.guarantee_affiliate_2: Real-time tracking of your performance and earnings.
ServicesPage.guarantee_affiliate_3: Support from our marketing team to maximize your impact.
ServicesPage.guarantee_affiliate_4: Flexible payouts and hassle-free withdrawal process.

CommonComponents.sellYourDesignsDesc: Launch your own brand by selling custom designs on our platform. Reach a wider audience and turn your creativity into profit.
CommonComponents.affiliateProgramDesc: Join our affiliate program to earn commissions by promoting our products. Share your unique link and get rewarded for every sale.
CommonComponents.fastPrintingDeliveryDesc: We take care of printing and shipping process.
CommonComponents.excellentCustomerSupportDesc: Our dedicated customer support team is here to help you with any questions or issues, ensuring a smooth and satisfying experience.
CommonComponents.step1Desc: Select a category for your Product
CommonComponents.step2Name: Step 2: Add your design or choose an existing one

CreateAffiliateAccountPage.earnCommission: Earn a commission on every sale made through your referral!
CreateAffiliateAccountPage.sellerWarning: Warning! You already created a seller account. If you proceed with creating an affiliate account, your existing store will be deleted.
CreateAffiliateAccountPage.howItWorks1: As an affiliate, you will choose a product from our platform and generate a unique referral link for that product. You can then share this link with your audience through social media.
CreateAffiliateAccountPage.howItWorks2: When someone uses your referral link to place an order, the system will track the order and if it is paid then automatically will assign the sale to your account. You will earn a commission for each sale made through your referral link.
CreateAffiliateAccountPage.howItWorks3: You can monitor all your sales, referrals, and commissions through your affiliate dashboard in real-time, allowing you to track your earnings as they grow.
CreateAffiliateAccountPage.howGetPaid1: You will earn a commission on each sale made through your referral link. The commission is a percentage of the total sale value, and this rate can vary depending on the product.
CreateAffiliateAccountPage.howGetPaid2: Payments are processed in each week, provided you have reached the minimum payout threshold. You can choose to receive your earnings via bank transfer, D17 or through Flouci App.
CreateAffiliateAccountPage.howGetPaid3: You can track your pending commissions and payment history directly in your affiliate dashboard. Our platform ensures that you are paid for every successful referral.
CreateAffiliateAccountPage.acceptTerms: I understand and I want to begin.

AboutPage.discover_brand_purpose: Discover the purpose of our brand!
AboutPage.define_business_desc: • Our platform offers a unique print-on-demand service, allowing customers to create and customize their own designs on their own choice of products. We empower artists, entrepreneurs, and anyone with a creative spark to bring their ideas to life. By providing this platform, we enable Tunisian designers to unleash their creativity, transforming their visions into reality and sharing their art through our brand.
AboutPage.goal_title: 2- The goal we want to reach:
AboutPage.goal_desc: • Our goal is to become the go-to destination for personalized products, making customization easy, fun, and accessible to everyone. We aim to support creativity and innovation, providing a platform where anyone can showcase their designs, reach a global audience, and turn their passion into profit.
AboutPage.why_different_title: 3- Why we're different from other brands:
AboutPage.why_different_desc: • What sets us apart is our commitment to quality, sustainability, and customer satisfaction. We use eco-friendly printing processes and source materials that are both durable and ethically produced. Our user-friendly interface and dedicated customer support ensure that every customer, whether they're designing for themselves or starting their own brand, has a seamless experience from start to finish. We also offer fast shipping and a satisfaction guarantee, so our customers can shop with confidence.

BuyingPolicyPage.whenProductDelivered: When a product is delivered to you, you can check it yourself right away when the delivery man hands it over to you.
BuyingPolicyPage.productsCanOnlyBeExchanged: Products can only be exchanged if there is a clear defect. For example, you cannot return or exchange a product simply because you changed your mind after making the purchase.
BuyingPolicyPage.weDoNotAcceptExchanges: We do not accept exchanges due to incorrect sizing or if you wish to change the size after receiving the product. All product dimensions are clearly detailed in centimeters on the product page, so please review them carefully before placing your order. As each item is custom-printed based on your specifications, we cannot resell a product that was printed specifically for you if an incorrect size was ordered.
BuyingPolicyPage.whenOrderingMultipleItems: When ordering multiple items, please note that once the order is processed, it cannot be returned or exchanged, as each product is printed uniquely for you. In such cases, we recommend ordering a sample first to ensure product quality before placing a larger order.
BuyingPolicyPage.theProductMustBeInItsOriginalCondition: The product must be in its original condition, including all packaging and components, for any exchange to be processed.
BuyingPolicyPage.ifProductExchangedDueToVisibleDefect: If a product is exchanged due to a visible defect, it will be replaced with a new item within 7 business days, starting from the time the original product is returned to us.
BuyingPolicyPage.inCaseOfReturn: In case of a return, we will cover the return shipping costs for products with manufacturing defects. However, the customer is responsible for the initial shipping fees.

SellingPolicyPage.design_quality: Design Quality: To ensure the best product quality, designs submitted must be high resolution with dimensions of at least 3000x3000 pixels. This helps maintain detail clarity and ensures high-quality printing on products.
SellingPolicyPage.intellectual_property_rights: Intellectual Property Rights: All designs you submit must be your original work or you must have full rights to use them. Submitting or selling designs that infringe on the intellectual property rights of others is prohibited. If any infringement is detected, the design will be removed immediately, and legal actions may be taken.
SellingPolicyPage.content_guidelines: Content Guidelines: We welcome all artistic styles, but designs must adhere to ethical and legal standards. Content that is discriminatory, sexually explicit, politically extreme, or promotes hatred or violence is not allowed.
SellingPolicyPage.approval_process: Approval Process: All designs will be reviewed by our team to ensure they comply with platform policies. This may take some time, and you will be notified once your design is accepted or rejected, along with reasons for any rejections.
SellingPolicyPage.pricing_and_earnings: Pricing and Earnings: You have the freedom to set the price for your designs, keeping in mind that competitive pricing can increase sales opportunities. You will receive a percentage of the profits from each sale of your design, which will be periodically transferred to your account.
SellingPolicyPage.updates_and_management: Updates and Management: You can update or remove your designs from the platform at any time. You’ll also have easy access to manage your design portfolio through your dedicated dashboard.
SellingPolicyPage.support_and_communication: Support and Communication: We are here to support you! If you encounter any issues or have any questions, our support team is available to assist you and ensure a smooth and profitable experience on our platform.

PrivacyPolicyPage.designInformation: Design Information: Design files and related data
PrivacyPolicyPage.orderProcessing: Order Processing: To fulfill orders and communicate with you
PrivacyPolicyPage.serviceImprovement: Service Improvement: To enhance and develop our platform
PrivacyPolicyPage.communication: Communication: To send updates and promotional materials
PrivacyPolicyPage.serviceProviders: Service Providers: We share information with third parties that assist us in operating
PrivacyPolicyPage.legalRequirements: Legal Requirements: We may disclose information as required by law
PrivacyPolicyPage.dataProtection: We use measures to protect your information
PrivacyPolicyPage.accessAndCorrection: Access and Correction: You can access and update your information
PrivacyPolicyPage.deletion: Deletion: Request deletion of your information where possible
